fields.description:
In Titanium 5.1.0 we implemented textinput behavior for iOS notifications with TIMOB-19184.

Android just [announced|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/api/Titanium.App.iOS-property-USER_NOTIFICATION_BEHAVIOR_TEXTINPUT] a similar features for Android N.

We should attempt to combine both into a single cross-platform API.

If this is not possible, we should implement it in away to closely match the new Android API.
fields.summary: Android N: Implement Direct Reply like Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_BEHAVIOR_TEXTINPUT

comments.body: Closing as duplicate with regards to the information provided elsewhere in this ticket.
